action.action-desc: Mr. Johnson of South Dakota introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To provide that no Federal funds shall be used to alter, change, destroy, or remove, in whole or in part, any name, face, or other feature on the Mount Rushmore National Memorial.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Mount Rushmore Protection Act.

paragraph.text: Mount Rushmore National Memorial is Americaâ€™s Shrine of Democracy.
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial depicts the faces of Presidents George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt, and Abraham Lincoln, with the beauty of the Black Hills of South Dakota.

section.header: Prohibition on use of Federal funds
section.text: No Federal funds shall be used to alter, change, destroy, or remove, in whole or in part, any name, face, or other feature on the Mount Rushmore National Memorial.
